Title: Poppler: Multiple vulnerabilities
Synopsis:
Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Poppler, the worst of
    which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

Background.Text: Poppler is a PDF rendering library based on the xpdf-3.0 code base.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Poppler. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted PDF using Poppler, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All Poppler users should upgrade to the latest version:
